thread.title: HBO’s U.S. Streaming Customers Exceed 5 Million

author: Joe Flint
title: HBO’s U.S. Streaming Customers Exceed 5 Million
text:
HBO posted its best year of subscriber growth as streaming customers more than doubled, helping to drive revenue and profit increases at parent company Time Warner Inc.
Strong gains at both HBO and the Turner cable networks helped Time Warner boost revenue and income more than analysts predicted. The company’s revenue rose 9% to $8.6 billion and operating income gained 13% to $1.9 billion for the quarter ended Dec. 31.
